game.shortDescription: 기록 제조기 엔터테인먼트 프랜차이즈에 거는 팬들의 기대를 뛰어넘으며, Call of Duty®: Black Ops II는 기술과 무기가 융합하여 새로운 전쟁을 만들어낸 21세기의 근미래 냉전 속으로 플레이어를 이끕니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pushing the boundaries of what fans have come to expect from the record-setting entertainment franchise, Call of Duty®: Black Ops II propels players into a near future Cold War

reviewHighlights.text: If they were gonna remake Black Ops 2, this was the year to do it. But instead we're stuck with Black Ops 7...
I want to preface this by saying that Black ops 2 back in 2012 was a very fun game for the time. Had tons of fun playing zombies with friends back in...
